title: Tarea principal: Planea un viaje a cuenca de un fin de semana
description: Planea un viaje a cuenca de un fin de semana

subtasks.title: Transportation
subtasks.description: Responsible for arranging the mode of transportation to and from Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: A detailed plan for traveling to and from Cuenca.
responsibilities: Researching and booking flights, trains, or buses.

subtasks.title: Research transportation options
subtasks.description: Identify and compare available transportation modes (flights, trains, buses) to and from Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of available transportation options with schedules and prices.

subtasks.title: Identify available flights to and from Cuenca
subtasks.description: Research and list all available flight options to and from Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of airlines, schedules, and prices for flights to and from Cuenca.

subtasks.title: Research train options to and from Cuenca
subtasks.description: Investigate and compile information on train services to and from Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of train companies, schedules, and prices for trains to and from Cuenca.

subtasks.title: Explore bus routes to and from Cuenca
subtasks.description: Gather details on bus routes connecting to and from Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of bus companies, routes, schedules, and prices for buses to and from Cuenca.

subtasks.title: Book transportation tickets
subtasks.description: Reserve seats on chosen mode of transportation to ensure availability for the trip.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmed tickets for the journey to and from Cuenca.

subtasks.title: Research transportation options
subtasks.description: Research available transportation options for the journey to and from Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of available transportation options with details such as schedules, prices, and availability.

subtasks.title: Plan local transportation in Cuenca
subtasks.description: Determine how to move around in Cuenca, considering taxis, public transportation, or car rentals.
subtasks.expected_output: Local transportation plan within Cuenca.

subtasks.title: Research taxi services in Cuenca
subtasks.description: Gather information on available taxi companies, rates, and how to hail a taxi in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of reliable taxi companies, their rates, and instructions on how to hail a taxi in Cuenca.

subtasks.title: Explore public transportation options in Cuenca
subtasks.description: Investigate the different public transportation modes available in Cuenca, such as buses or trams, routes, schedules, and fares.
subtasks.expected_output: Summary of public transportation options in Cuenca, including routes, schedules, and fares.

subtasks.title: Evaluate car rental services in Cuenca
subtasks.description: Research car rental companies, compare prices, terms, and conditions, and determine the process for renting a car in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: Comparison of car rental companies, their prices, terms, and conditions, along with a guide on how to rent a car in Cuenca.

subtasks.title: Accommodation
subtasks.description: Responsible for finding suitable lodging options for the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: A list of potential accommodations with booking details.
responsibilities: Researching hotels, hostels, or vacation rentals in Cuenca.
Making reservations based on preferences and budget.

subtasks.title: Research Accommodation Options
subtasks.description: Research hotels, hostels, or vacation rentals in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of potential lodging options with details.

subtasks.title: Research Hotels in Cuenca
subtasks.description: Research hotels in Cuenca, focusing on amenities, prices, and reviews.

subtasks.title: Research Hostels in Cuenca
subtasks.description: Research hostels in Cuenca, focusing on amenities, prices, and reviews.

subtasks.title: Research Vacation Rentals in Cuenca
subtasks.description: Research vacation rentals in Cuenca, focusing on amenities, prices, and reviews.

subtasks.title: Determine Budget
subtasks.description: Establish the budget for accommodation.
subtasks.expected_output: Set maximum amount to spend on lodging.

subtasks.title: Define Accommodation Preferences
subtasks.description: Identify preferred accommodation type, location, and amenities.
subtasks.expected_output: List of accommodation preferences.

subtasks.title: Research Accommodation Options
subtasks.description: Explore various lodging options within the defined budget.
subtasks.expected_output: List of potential accommodations with prices.

subtasks.title: Compare Accommodation Prices
subtasks.description: Compare prices of shortlisted accommodations to determine the most cost-effective option.
subtasks.expected_output: Selected accommodation within the budget.

subtasks.title: Check Availability
subtasks.description: Verify the availability of chosen accommodations for the weekend.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation of available dates for booking.

subtasks.title: Search Accommodation Websites
subtasks.description: Search for chosen accommodations on various websites to check availability.
subtasks.expected_output: List of available dates for each accommodation option.

subtasks.title: Contact Accommodation Owners
subtasks.description: Reach out to the owners of the accommodations to confirm availability for the chosen dates.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation of availability from accommodation owners.

subtasks.title: Make Reservations
subtasks.description: Book the chosen accommodation for the weekend.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation of reservation details.

subtasks.title: Check Availability
subtasks.description: Verify the availability of the chosen accommodation for the weekend.
subtasks.expected_output: Availability confirmation

subtasks.title: Confirm Reservation Details
subtasks.description: Finalize reservation details including dates, room type, and any special requests.
subtasks.expected_output: Reservation details confirmed

subtasks.title: Confirm Booking Details
subtasks.description: Double-check reservation details and ensure all necessary information is correct.
subtasks.expected_output: Verified booking information.

subtasks.title: Verify Check-in Date
subtasks.description: Ensure the check-in date on the reservation matches the intended date.
subtasks.expected_output: Correct check-in date verified.

subtasks.title: Verify Room Type
subtasks.description: Confirm that the reserved room type aligns with the guest's preferences.
subtasks.expected_output: Correct room type verified.

subtasks.title: Arrange Transportation to Accommodation
subtasks.description: Plan transportation from arrival point to the chosen accommodation.
subtasks.expected_output: Transportation arrangements to the lodging.

subtasks.title: Select Transportation Option
subtasks.description: Choose between taxi, public transportation, or rental car for transportation to the accommodation.
subtasks.expected_output: Chosen transportation option.

subtasks.title: Book Transportation
subtasks.description: Make reservations or bookings for the chosen transportation option.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmed transportation booking.

subtasks.title: Review Cancellation Policy
subtasks.description: Understand the cancellation policy of the booked accommodation.
subtasks.expected_output: Knowledge of the cancellation terms in case of changes.

subtasks.title: Check Cancellation Deadline
subtasks.description: Determine the deadline for cancelling the reservation without penalty.
subtasks.expected_output: Deadline for penalty-free cancellation.

subtasks.title: Understand Refund Process
subtasks.description: Familiarize with the steps required to request a refund in case of cancellation.
subtasks.expected_output: Knowledge of the refund process.

subtasks.title: Review Exceptions
subtasks.description: Identify any exceptions or special conditions in the cancellation policy.
subtasks.expected_output: Understanding of any special cases where cancellation terms may differ.

subtasks.title: Activities
subtasks.description: Responsible for planning the itinerary and activities during the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: An organized schedule of things to do in Cuenca.
responsibilities: Researching tourist attractions, landmarks, and cultural sites in Cuenca.
Scheduling tours, excursions, and dining experiences.

subtasks.title: Research tourist attractions
subtasks.description: Identify and gather information on popular tourist attractions, landmarks, and cultural sites in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of must-visit attractions in Cuenca.

subtasks.title: Identify popular tourist attractions
subtasks.description: Research and compile a list of popular tourist attractions in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of popular tourist attractions in Cuenca

subtasks.title: Gather information on landmarks
subtasks.description: Gather detailed information on the landmarks in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: Detailed information on landmarks in Cuenca

subtasks.title: Explore cultural sites
subtasks.description: Identify and explore cultural sites in Cuenca to gather information.
subtasks.expected_output: Information on cultural sites in Cuenca

subtasks.title: Plan daily itinerary
subtasks.description: Create a detailed schedule of activities for each day of the weekend trip, including tours, excursions, and dining experiences.
subtasks.expected_output: Daily itinerary with planned activities and timings.

subtasks.title: Research tourist attractions
subtasks.description: Research and compile a list of tourist attractions to visit during the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: List of tourist attractions with descriptions and opening hours.

subtasks.title: Schedule tours and excursions
subtasks.description: Plan and book guided tours and excursions for each day of the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmed bookings and itinerary for tours and excursions.

subtasks.title: Plan dining experiences
subtasks.description: Research and make reservations for dining experiences during the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: Dining reservations and itinerary for dining experiences.

subtasks.title: Book tours and experiences
subtasks.description: Make reservations for guided tours, excursions, and any special experiences in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation of bookings for selected activities.

subtasks.title: Select guided tours
subtasks.description: Choose specific guided tours based on preferences and availability.
subtasks.expected_output: List of selected guided tours.

subtasks.title: Reserve excursions
subtasks.description: Make reservations for excursions to popular destinations in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation of excursion bookings.

subtasks.title: Book special experiences
subtasks.description: Reserve any unique or special experiences offered in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation of special experience bookings.

subtasks.title: Check for local events
subtasks.description: Research and check for any local events, festivals, or markets happening during the weekend in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of local events and their schedules.

subtasks.title: Research local festivals
subtasks.description: Identify any local festivals happening during the weekend in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of local festivals and their schedules.

subtasks.title: Explore local markets
subtasks.description: Research and identify any local markets happening during the weekend in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of local markets and their schedules.

subtasks.title: Budgeting
subtasks.description: Responsible for managing the financial aspects of the trip.
subtasks.expected_output: A budget plan outlining expenses for transportation, accommodation, and activities.
responsibilities: Estimating costs for transportation, lodging, meals, and entertainment.
Tracking expenses and ensuring the trip stays within budget.

subtasks.title: Estimate Transportation Costs
subtasks.description: Calculate the expenses for transportation to and from Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: Estimated cost for transportation.

subtasks.title: Research Accommodation Options
subtasks.description: Look for suitable lodging options in Cuenca and determine their costs.
subtasks.expected_output: List of potential accommodations with their prices.

subtasks.title: Research Accommodation Options
subtasks.description: Look for suitable lodging options in Cuenca.

subtasks.title: Determine Costs
subtasks.description: Determine the costs of the potential accommodations.

subtasks.title: Plan Meals Budget
subtasks.description: Estimate the budget for meals during the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: Meal budget for the entire stay.

subtasks.title: Estimate total number of meals needed
subtasks.description: Determine the total number of meals required for the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: Total number of meals needed

subtasks.title: Research average meal costs
subtasks.description: Gather information on the average cost of meals at the destination.
subtasks.expected_output: Average meal costs

subtasks.title: Calculate total estimated meal budget
subtasks.description: Multiply the total number of meals needed by the average meal cost to determine the total estimated meal budget.
subtasks.expected_output: Total estimated meal budget

subtasks.title: Research Activities and Entertainment Costs
subtasks.description: Identify potential activities and entertainment options in Cuenca and estimate their costs.
subtasks.expected_output: List of activities with associated expenses.

subtasks.title: Identify Potential Activities in Cuenca
subtasks.description: Research and list potential activities available in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of potential activities in Cuenca.

subtasks.title: Estimate Costs of Activities
subtasks.description: Estimate the costs associated with each potential activity identified.
subtasks.expected_output: Estimated costs for each activity.
